name: fullstack-monorepo
description: Production-ready full-stack monorepo with React, NestJS, and TypeScript

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.test: npm run test -w backend && npm run test -w frontend
scripts.test:cov: npm run test:cov -w backend && npm run test:cov -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w shared && npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
scripts.format: npm run format -w shared && npm run format -w backend && npm run format -w frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w shared && npm run typecheck -w backend && npm run typecheck -w frontend
